articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Three ways the Spring Statement could affect you and your money
articles.description: While the Spring Statement focusses on the wider UK economy, it could have implications for your money.
articles.content:
The Spring Statement doesn't come in isolation. Next week, a series of household bills will rise.
From 1 April, you will pay more for water, energy and your council tax.
However, if you're over 21 … [+1265 chars]
